name: acs
info: ACS 2018 PUMA micro-data for Alameda and Santa Clara Counties

variables.person_number: ACS identifier for each person in a household
variables.time_work: Time to commute to work in minutes
variables.wages_12m: wages and salary from past 12 months
variables.retirement_income_12m: income from retirement plans in past 12 months
variables.lived_here_1yr_ago: Did respondent live at current address 1 year ago?
variables.worked_last_week: Did the respondent work last week
variables.work_class: class of work - government, private or self-employed
variables.school_enrollment: Is respondent currently enrolled in school?
variables.language_other_english: Does Respondent speak a language other than English?
variables.speak_english: How well the respondent speaks English - NA is native speaker
variables.child_birth_past_12m: Has Respondent gave birth to a child in the last 12 months?
variables.children_presence: If female, are children present in the household
variables.ancestry: Did respondent select single or multiple ancestries?
